definition: to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose

sentences.english: The cold weather set back the planting by two weeks.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷的天气使插秧推迟两个星期。

sentences.english: All the new rice transplanters were quickly bought up the day they were offered for sale.
sentences.chinese: 所有的新型水稻插秧机在出售的当天就很快被买光了。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses a walking type seeding-planting machine in the agricultural machinery field.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型公开了农业机械领域的一种步行式插秧机。

sentences.english: The green fields remember the first time went transplanting rice seedlings.
sentences.chinese: 那些青葱葱的田间记着查利云第一次去田里插秧。

sentences.english: This paper reviewed entirely the research history of rice transplanter from postwar japan.
sentences.chinese: 摘要全面论述日本插秧机的研究历程。

sentences.english: All the new rice transplanters were quickly bought up the day they were offered foe sale.
sentences.chinese: 所有的新型水稻插秧机在出售的当天就很快被卖光了。

sentences.english: In accordance with the requirements of imported rice transplanter must use pure unleaded gasoline with a high.
sentences.chinese: 按要求，进口插秧机必须使用纯净的高号无铅汽油。

sentences.english: The newly designed rice transplanter will soon be operational.
sentences.chinese: 新设计的插秧机不久即可使用。

sentences.english: Rice-transplanters of this type are never known to have been bogged down in paddy fields.
sentences.chinese: 所有的新水稻插秧机在出售的当天就很快被买光了。

sentences.english: They use cattles to step the fields into muds, and then transplant rice seedlings.
sentences.chinese: 他们用牛踩田，把泥踩烂了就插秧。

sentences.english: The utility model provides a rice seed thrusting mechanism used in transplanting device.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型提供了一种水稻插秧机推秧机构。

sentences.english: Transplanting end of the day is called seeding the door closed.
sentences.chinese: 插秧结束日称为关秧门。

definition: to harrow/to break the ground with a hoe
